thread.title: 6 Bollywood Leading Ladies Show Us How To Style Our Coats This Winter
thread.title_full: 6 Bollywood Leading Ladies Show Us How To Style Our Coats This Winter

title: 6 Bollywood Leading Ladies Show Us How To Style Our Coats This Winter
text:
facebook 465 SHARES 
Let‚Äôs admit it ‚Äì things are getting more than just nippy if you‚Äôre up North. We‚Äôre in Delhi, and it‚Äôs freezing at night. Most of our time is spent in handpicking the cosiest separates that we own so we can layer up against the cold. Safe to say that it‚Äôs time we brought them big coats out. Which brings us to most critical question of them all ‚Äì how do we style them? Well, we rummaged through the best coat moments courtesy our Bollywood ladies to inspire your winter style. Here are 6 times our celeb girl crushes nailed their outerwear game. 
1.Rani Mukherjee lets the collarless coat be the hero of her outfit, keeping her separates to all-black. The Tumblr-pink Dior tote looks like it has walked right out of our Pinterest boards. Sport this look while jetsetting to your next vacation. Rani Mukerji was spotted at the airport in a casual look which she paired with @dior sunglasses and a @louisvuitton handbag #bollywood #style #fashion #beauty #bollywoodstyle #bollywoodfashion #indianfashion #celebstyle #ranimukerji #dior #louisvuitton A photo posted by @afashionistasdiaries on Dec 26, 2016 at 9:28pm PST 
2. Kangana Ranaut‚Äôs Pero coat calls out to all the bohemian lovers. She throws over that striped cosy separate with a lace maxi and sports nerdy-chic glasses. Wear this combination to a jazz night. Kangana snapped at PVR Juhu in Mumbai last night üòç‚ù§Ô∏è Wearing: @ilovepero Styled by @stylebyami - #kanganaranaut #bollywood A photo posted by üíï Kangana Ranaut üíï (@kanganaranautfanclub) on Dec 23, 2016 at 12:14pm PST 
3.Priyanka Chopra‚Äôs yellow vest scores high on wearability. If you are allergic to the bright colour, trade it for a neutral hue. Work your calf-grazing separates with matching pants and a full-sleeved top to a very-important work meeting. @priyankachopra Outfit - @31philliplim Shoes - @louboutinworld Styled by - @stylebyami @shnoy09 #bollywood #style #fashion #beauty #bollywoodstyle #bollywoodfashion #indianfashion #celebstyle #priyankachopra #31philliplim A photo posted by @afashionistasdiaries on Dec 21, 2016 at 10:02pm PST 
4.Trust Sonam Kapoor to transition a formal blazer into a cool-girl outing. Here, she casually throws hers over a tiered white dress. Times when you aren‚Äôt willing to seriously glam up for a dinner date, this could be your ultimate cop - out. Sonam Kapoor's Airport Look FAB or DRAB? #bollywood #style #fashion #beauty #bollywoodstyle #bollywoodfashion #indianfashion #celebstyle #sonamkapoor A photo posted by @afashionistasdiaries on Dec 4, 2016 at 9:53am PST 
5.Esha Gupta reminded us about the undying charm of a well-constructed overcoat. She layers her coat with a striped top and finishes it off with skinny white jeans. Replicate this look for a brunch date with the boyfriend. @egupta Top, Pants & Coat - @tommyxgigi Styled by - @aasthasharma612 #bollywood #style #fashion #beauty #bollywoodstyle #bollywoodfashion #indianfashion #celebstyle #eshagupta #tommyxgigi #tommyhilfiger A photo posted by @afashionistasdiaries on Dec 1, 2016 at 3:16am PST 
6.Nailing the nude palette, Alia Bhatt matches her long coat with knee-high boots and a V-neck top. The restrained colour palette is an easy winner. A day event is where this should be ideally worn.
